appShowcase.title: Shopify Accordion Section
appShowcase.description: Organize content neatly using a clean accordion layout. This section helps present FAQs, product details, or important information in a structured and easy-to-navigate format without overwhelming visitors.

mainContent.heading: What is the Accordion Section?
paragraphs: The Accordion section is a flexible Shopify section designed to display content in expandable and collapsible rows.
It is ideal for organizing FAQs, product information, policies, or any content that benefits from a clean and structured layout.
By grouping information into collapsible items, this section improves readability and helps customers quickly find what they are looking for.

features.title: Use Anywhere
features.description: Add the accordion section to product pages, informational pages, or custom layouts.

features.title: Default State Control
features.description: Choose whether accordion items are open or collapsed by default.

features.title: Navigation Icons
features.description: Enable or disable icons for expanding and collapsing content.

features.title: Icon & Text Styling
features.description: Adjust colors, fonts, and spacing to match your storefront design.
